title: cabaret
review: exceeded all expectations. the cabaret format / atmosphere and 360 degree stage altered my brain chemistry

title: maybe happy ending
review: the pixar equivalent of a musical, i can see why it's popular. solid but not groundbreaking, still very sweet and stunning set / visuals

title: a very potter sequel
review: better than the original, solely b/c of umbridge

title: a very potter senior year
review: rip darren criss' curls :( docking a point due to harry potter's unfortunate haircut

title: exorcistic
review: bit messy, hard to differentiate what's in the musical and what's in the musical-w/in-a-musical. still an interesting experience, and had its funny moments

title: slam frank
review: 2025 version of book of mormon, but actually offensive. probably too blasphemous for broadway, but the low-budget set adds to the charm
